Texts.Eng: I've been expecting you, Captain. Here, I will assemble that weapon for you... Just a little longer... There! A fully restored jumprifle! Be careful where you point that thing: it delivers quite the punch.

^green;Take the ^orange;frame Ayurin built ^green;and bring it to ^orange;Vanhas ^green;here in the ^orange;Starfarer's Refuge. ^reset;He will know how to combine the frame and the reactivated core to build a fully functional jumprifle. It's been an honour working on this project with you, Captain.
